fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE
Introduction
My major background is Applied Mathematics and Informatics. All of my works are around programing, algorithm coding, data 
processing, statistical analyzing, modeling and equation numerical solving. I am a science lover and researcher who always 
want to catch applied math and computer problems.
I am a sociable, friendly, pleasant and responsible person. With an open-minded curiosity, a personal and professional growth 
and a dedicated spirit, I not only consider every job as opportunities of learning and developing myself but also believe that is 
where I could have great contributions.
Personal Details
Full name:    Vu Viet Hung
Gender:        Male
Nationality:   Vietnamese
Phone:         +84 1274538798
Email:           viethungttbk@gmail.com
Qualification

Quantitative Finance: Modeling, Pricing, Forecasting, and Simulation ----------------------------------------------Master Knowledge
Statistical Analyzing, Database Management, Business Programing ---------------------------------------------Confident Experience
Machine Learning, Data Processing, Crawling, BI ----------------------------------------------------------------------------Non-stop Growth

Research Fields
Interest
Currently, I am interested in using Statistics, Data Analyzing, Trend and Volatility Forecasting in Social, Business, 
Manufacturing, Finance and Economics.
Public Profile
https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Vu_Hung4/contributions
Results
--------------------------------------------Trend Following Trading -------------------------------------------------
Expanding a model in optimal control trading with a mean reverting asset, building an interesting model and using it to trade
gold (Matlab)
---------------------------------------------------Value at Risk ----------------------------------------------------------
Considering Value at Risk estimate methods for limited price markets, building a CRAN package and practicing with historical 
data of Vietnam stock market (R)
------------------------------------Extending Problems in Clifford Analysis ----------------------------------
Review some extending problem in complex analysis and quaternion analysis, using Hörmander’s scheme to solve a new problem 
in Clifford analysis
--------------------------------------------Fourier Sine Convolution ------------------------------------------------
Review a Fourier Cosine Convolution and propose a new Fourier Sine Convolution, its properties and applications
----------------------------Differencing general even order differential operator -------------------------
Propose a differencing formula with 2ndorder of accuracy and apply it to solve 6thorder boundary problem
----------------------------------------------------Some others ---------------------------------------------------------
Shadow Banking Mechanism (Excel), New PDE for Asian Option Pricing (Matlab), Using Neural Network for Dual Response 
Surface Optimization (Matlab)
